summary: Header.tsx removes the separate "Contact" nav link and retains a single "Contact Us" button linking to /contact on both desktop and mobile. However, the header nav items now only include Home and Gallery, suggesting another navigation item (e.g., Courses) was removed, which conflicts with the acceptance criteria. Two metadata/state files were also modified without being requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: No other header navigation items are removed or renamed while removing the duplicate "Contact" link (i.e., only the extra "Contact" option should be removed).
missing_requirements.reason: The updated header navItems list contains only "Home" and "Gallery"; any previously existing header nav item(s) besides the duplicate "Contact" appear to have been removed, violating the AC that no other header navigation items are removed or renamed.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/rewrote broad application feature summaries (App, Footer, pages, hooks, branding, etc.) in frontend-file-summaries.txt unrelated to removing a duplicate Contact header link.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to removing a duplicate header Contact option; changing repository-wide file summary content is not requested and exceeds scope/non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified overall project state/versioning and long-form project description in project_state.json unrelated to the header Contact link change.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest contains no requirement to update project state metadata; this is extra work outside the requested header navigation change.
